prompt: A digital photograph of a young girl with long straight brown hair and gray eyes, blowing a soft pink bubble gum in front of a round LED mirror. The girl wears a striped pastel shirt and a white bracelet with lettered beads spelling 'MIRACLE'. On the wall behind her, there is a glowing neon poster with the word 'AERONYTE' inside a red heart. On the right side of the mirror, a blue sticker says 'AERONYTE Believe' with a minimalistic crystal ball symbol. The room has a cozy, warm ambiance with soft evening lighting, pastel decor, and yellow star stickers on the pink wall. The girl's expression is calm and dreamy, capturing a magical, cinematic moment. The mirror reflects a feeling of wonder and belief.

style.visual_style: high-end fashion photography + soft cinematic lighting
style.render_quality: 4K upscale, fine skin details, filmic grain
style.camera: medium close-up, frontal angle, vertical framing
